description: Ministry of Water Supply and Drainage - Acquisiiton of land in Nikahetiya, Udunuwara D/S Division, Kandy District for the construction of Hiddaula Pressure Reduction Tank No. 2 under the Kandy South W.S. Project - Rajagalatenna, Uhana D/S Division, Ampara District for the construction of access road to the Rajagalatenna Water Tower Nallur, Nallur D/S Division, Jaffna District for the Construction of the Nallur Water Tank - Pothgoda, Pathahewaheta D/S Division, Kandy District for the Construction of the access road to the Pothgoda Water Tank
